category: Member City/Provincial Sports Association Regulations/Article 36 (Approval and Cancellation of City/County/District Sports Association Executives)
contents: Article 36 (Approval and cancellation of city/county/district sports council executives) ① The president of the city/county/district sports council shall take office upon approval by the city/provincial sports council. Revised on March 30, 2020, July 29, 2020. ② The city/county/district sports council must include one school sports expert as vice president. ③ The city/provincial sports council may cancel or withdraw the approval ex officio if there is a defect in the approval due to disqualification of an executive or other reasons after approval by the president of the city/county/district sports council. Revised 2020. 7. 29., 2022. 5. 10.
